name: Abyss Herald: Wicked Torrents
storytext: The world shall be severed, and all shall be obliterated.
source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with Abyss Herald: Wicked Torrents

skills.name: Vortex Edge
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG</color>, then performs "<color=#FFFFFFFF>Prepare Skill</color>" for <color=#FFFFFFFF>Rippling Blades</color>.
skills.description: Deals 2 Hydro DMG, then performs "Prepare Skill" for Rippling Blades.

skills.name: Torrential Shock
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT]. Creates 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C122033]</color> on the opponent's side of the field.
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 3 {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG</color>. Creates 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Curse of the Undercurrent</color> on the opponent's side of the field.
skills.description: Deals 3 Hydro DMG. Creates 1 Curse of the Undercurrent on the opponent's side of the field.

skills.name: Watery Rebirth
skills.descriptionraw: (Passive) When the battle begins, this character gains <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C122031]</color>.
skills.descriptionreplaced: (Passive) When the battle begins, this character gains <color=#FFFFFFFF>Watery Rebirth</color>.
skills.description: (Passive) When the battle begins, this character gains Watery Rebirth.
